# ssttrackunion.createOrReplaceTempView("ssttrackunion")

# #Create DataFrame for the sstwaybillsperparcel LMS Table
# sstwaybillsperparcel = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstwaybillsperparcel.parquet', format='parquet')
# sstwaybillsperparcel.createOrReplaceTempView("sstwaybillsperparcel")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmstrack
AS
SELECT 

t.ID as lms_track_id,
t.LoadID as lms_track_loadid,
t.ParcelID as lms_track_parcelid,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_waybillid as lms_track_waybillid,
t.fromlocid as lms_track_fromlocid,
t.tolocid as lms_track_tolocid,
t.TrackTypeID as lms_track_tracktypeid,
t.OpenDt as lms_track_opendt,
t.CloseDt as lms_track_closedt,
t.specdel as lms_track_specdel

FROM ssttrackunion t
LEFT JOIN sstwaybillsperparcel w on w.lms_waybillsperparcel_loadid = t.loadid and w.lms_waybillsperparcel_parcelid = t.parcelid
